resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::DocumentationVersion`` resource creates a snapshot of the documentation for an API. For more information, see [Representation of API Documentation in API Gateway](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/api-gateway-documenting-api-content-representation.html) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description about the new documentation snapshot.

type.description: A description about the new documentation snapshot.

properties.name: DocumentationVersion
properties.description: The version identifier of the to-be-updated documentation version.

type.description: The version identifier of the to-be-updated documentation version.

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

type.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.
